import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../styles/Home.css'; const Home = () => { const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('hero'); // Handle navbar background change on scroll useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setScrolled(window.scrollY > 50); // Optional: Update active section based on scroll position const sections = ['hero', 'services', 'why-us', 'testimonials', 'blog', 'contact']; for (const section of sections) { const element = document.getElementById(section); if (element) { const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect(); if (rect.top <= 100 && rect.bottom >= 100) { setActiveSection(section); break; } } } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
